text: aur jin logon ne buraeeyaan keen, to buraee ka badala usee jaisa hoga; unapar apamaan chhaaya hoga aur unake lie allaah se bachaane vaala koee na hoga. unake mukhon par aise kaalima chhaayee hogee, jaise andheree raat ke kaale parde, unapar pade hue hon. vahee naarakee honge aur vahee usamen sadaavaasee honge
